```{r cars, message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(forecast)
library(plotly)

# Colour theme
theme_set(theme_classic())

# Subset data
nottem_small <- window(nottem, start=c(1920, 1), end=c(1925, 12))

# ggplot
gg <- ggseasonplot(AirPassengers) + labs(title="International Airline Passengers")

# plotly
ggplotly(gg)
```
